title: rasengan
author: rasengan
content: Ends Dec 23, 2022 4:00 pm US PSThttps://www.timeanddate.com/countdown/to?iso=20221223T16&p0=137&msg=Auction&ud=1&font=cursiveStarting price: 30 BTCMinimum bidding increment: 0.1 BTCPayment Address: To be provided at end of auction/in person.Shipping: Someone will meet you in person for this transaction as long as you are local to the USA.https://www.walletexplorer.com/address/1GL4KQsBryksJCtzWCGqbgSxfowadf2jTT?from_firstbits=1gl4kqsb

comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: Holy shit! Amazing coin! I wish I could buy it

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Yes, pretty amazing. Welcome back, 11 years old account.I would highly recommend to contact one of the established escrows here on the forum. minerjones, krogothmanhatten, Hhampuz, MoparMiningLLC come to mind.You probably cannot expect anyone to bid and or be interested in such a high value transactions without a trusted 3rd party.Good luck!

comments.author: CoinageMint
comments.body: Beautiful coin, not too often these come up for sale.Please buy some cotton gloves to handle that baby with, it's in such great condition I would hate to see it tarnish from handling

comments.author: tread93
comments.body: Wow, looks like its in amazing condition! A coin that costs as much as a very nice house! If I were you I would grade this bad boy with PCGS and figure out to put that in the next stacks bowers auction and i'm sure you could fetch way more.

comments.author: Todamont
comments.body: This is amazing. Take it down to "Pawn Stars" Gold & Silver Pawn Shop in Vegas and see how much they'll offer you. Would be cool to see it on TV.

comments.author: sweeteye
comments.body: Seeing the bare thumb contact on the surface of this beauty makes me fucking cringe lmaoWishing you the best with this sale!

comments.author: Steeley
comments.body: Quote from: sweeteye on December 21, 2022, 08:38:11 PMSeeing the bare thumb contact on the surface of this beauty makes me fucking cringe lmaoWishing you the best with this sale!Yep, I winced as well. That can easily drop a grade by 1 to 2 grades and all but ensures that it will not be an MS 70 (although I doubt there will ever be a a 25 Cas with an MS 70 grade). This coin might be the nicest I have ever seen. Seems flawless except for the thumb.

comments.author: rasengan
comments.body: My thumb was super dry at that time and the coin is stored in a plastic pouch.

comments.author: rasengan
comments.body: This auction is now over. Coin was purchased in a bulk transaction with the other coin for 40BTC.
